## Summary
Brief description of what needs to be built.

## Why
Business justification or user need.

## Scope
What's included and what's explicitly excluded.

## Planning Checklist

### Discovery
- [ ] Problem understood
- [ ] Stakeholders identified
- [ ] Risks listed

### Specification
- [ ] Feature spec created: `docs/design/NNNN-name.md`
- [ ] Wireframes/mockups (if UI): 
- [ ] API contract (if backend):

### Technical Design
- [ ] Technical design created: `docs/design/NNNN-name-technical.md`
- [ ] Sequence diagrams included
- [ ] Data model documented
- [ ] Migration strategy (if needed)

### Approval
- [ ] Spec reviewed
- [ ] Technical design reviewed
- [ ] **APPROVED FOR IMPLEMENTATION**
